OrgName.entry: RECREATIONAL GROUP FOR ADULTS ON THE AUTISM SPECTRUM

Desc.entry: Group for adults with Aspergers or on the autism spectrum, people with social anxiety and similar issues. Gives people the opportunity to meet up in a safe environment, a chance to relate with others and engenders a sense of belonging and friendship.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Sat in the month at 2pm (outside the Showroom or in the lobby if it is raining)
